DOC.brief_summary: A Registry Study Evaluate Survival Long-Term Safety Subjects With Melanoma Who Previously Received Talimogene Laherparepvec
DOC.detailed_description: A Registry Study Evaluate Survival Long-Term Safety Subjects With Melanoma Who Previously Received least 1 dose Talimogene Laherparepvec . FU occur q3m .
DOC.criteria: All subject must provide informed consent prior initiation study activity . All subject must receive least one dose talimogene laherparepvec Amgen BioVEXsponsored clinical trial must permanently discontinue treatment trial . Subjects currently receive plan receive talimogene laherparepvec next 30 day .
